tool_description: Woorati API is an exhaustive data solution for anyone looking to obtain comprehensive business data about Finnish companies. This service empowers you to query company data using business ID, domain, or associated personnel. With this powerful tool, users can gain insights into a company's tax debt, financial health, and the technology stack they are utilizing. It also offers exclusive data about government purchases, providing a robust picture of the company's business operations. Streamline...
name: Comprehensive Business Insights for Finnish Companies
title: Comprehensive Business Insights for Finnish Companies
tool_name: Comprehensive Business Insights for Finnish Companies

api_list.name: Company search
api_list.description:
At least one parameter must be provided, but you can also provide multiple at the same time.

**qbid**: A unique identifier of a business.
        Type: String
        Example: "0111027-9"
    
**qname**: A company name or part of it.
        Type: String
        Example: "Asiakas"

**qperson**: A person who holds a position in a company or part of the name.
        Type: String
        Example: "Jäger"

website: The domain of the company.
        Type: String
        Example: "nokia.com"
    
**page**: The page number of results you wish to retrieve, used for pagination. If not specified, defaults to 1.
        Type: Integer
        Example: 1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://comprehensive-business-insights-for-finnish-companies.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/company/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "comprehensive-business-insights-for-finnish-companies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
